content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":78791,"originalJapaneseLine":"先ほどのロナとの会話が思い出された。","translatedEnglishLine":"I recalled the conversation I had with Rona earlier."},{"lineNumber":78792,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……私を殺して」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Kill me.\""},{"lineNumber":78793,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is...\""},{"lineNumber":78794,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どういう意味でしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What do you mean?\""},{"lineNumber":78795,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私が生きてるせいで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because I am alive..."},
{"lineNumber":78796,"originalJapaneseLine":"　沢山の人が……死んでいった……","translatedEnglishLine":"Many people... have died...\""},
{"lineNumber":78797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},
{"lineNumber":78798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いつもは……知らない人、だから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Usually... they're strangers, so..."},
{"lineNumber":78799,"originalJapaneseLine":"　怖いだけ、だったの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I just felt afraid...\""},
{"lineNumber":78800,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But...\""},
{"lineNumber":78801,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now...\""},
{"lineNumber":78802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},
{"lineNumber":78803,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……もう、嫌なの……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I don't want this anymore..."},
{"lineNumber":78804,"originalJapaneseLine":"　目の前で誰かが死ぬのは……","translatedEnglishLine":"Watching someone die right before my eyes...\""},
{"lineNumber":78805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「辛い……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's painful...\""},
{"lineNumber":78806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's why...\""},
{"lineNumber":78807,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おねがい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please...\""},
{"lineNumber":78808,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私を殺して……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kill me...\""},
{"lineNumber":78809,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...!\""},
{"lineNumber":78810,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビスケッタがロナに向けて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Biscetta raised a shard of glass toward Rona."},
{"lineNumber":78811,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガラスの破片を振り上げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"She lifted the glass shard high."},
{"lineNumber":78812,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ホワイ！　このキチガイ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why! You crazy woman!"},
{"lineNumber":78813,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ロナからドンタッチミー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't touch Rona!\""},
{"lineNumber":78814,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃー！　やめろ、ビスケッタさん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aah! Stop, Biscetta!\""},
{"lineNumber":78815,"originalJapaneseLine":"「御主人様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Master...\""},
{"lineNumber":78816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ロナさん！　すみません！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rona! I'm sorry!\""},
{"lineNumber":78817,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ああ……わたし、やっと死ねるんだ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Ah... I can finally die...)"},
{"lineNumber":78818,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ありがとうね……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Thank you...)"},
{"lineNumber":78819,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……お姉ちゃん）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...Big sister)"},
{"lineNumber":78820,"originalJapaneseLine":"鮮血が――舞う。","translatedEnglishLine":"Fresh blood—floated through the air."},
{"lineNumber":78821,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},
{"lineNumber":78822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃぁぁぁぁぁぁあああー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaaaaaahhhhh!"},
{"lineNumber":78823,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ロォォォォォナァァァァァァ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ronaaaaaaaa!?\""},
{"lineNumber":78824,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃーーーーーーーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Screeeeeeaaaaam!\""},
{"lineNumber":78825,"originalJapaneseLine":"レッドアイが体をブルブルと震わせる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Red Eye trembled violently."},
{"lineNumber":78826,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},
{"lineNumber":78827,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ポトッ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"    <Plop>"},
{"lineNumber":78828,"originalJapaneseLine":"寄生する力すら失ったのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"It had even lost the power to parasitize,"},
{"lineNumber":78829,"originalJapaneseLine":"自らトッポスから離れ、","translatedEnglishLine":"and it deliberately detached itself from Toppos,"},
{"lineNumber":78830,"originalJapaneseLine":"レッドアイの本体が床に落ちる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The main body of Red Eye fell to the floor."},
{"lineNumber":78831,"originalJapaneseLine":"それまで全てを踏み潰してきた筈の","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Red Eye, who until now had crushed everything,"},
{"lineNumber":78832,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レッドアイが惨めに床を這いつくばっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was now miserably crawling on the floor."},
{"lineNumber":78833,"originalJapaneseLine":"「み、ミーがダイする……？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I’m going to die...?\""},
{"lineNumber":78834,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ミー……死ぬ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Am I... going to die...?\""},
{"lineNumber":78835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ノオォォォォォー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Noooooooo!\""},
{"lineNumber":78836,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ミーは最強の兵器！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am the ultimate weapon!\""},
{"lineNumber":78837,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何故ェェェ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why..."},
{"lineNumber":78838,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何故、このミーがァァァ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Why me...\""},
{"lineNumber":78839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最大の敗因は、守ることを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn't the greatest cause of defeat learning to protect others?\""},
{"lineNumber":78840,"originalJapaneseLine":"　学習したことではないでしょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先ほどのロナとの会話が思い出された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I recalled the conversation I had with Rona earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沢山の人が……死んでいった……
「いつもは……知らない人、だから……
目の前で誰かが死ぬのは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching someone die right before my eyes..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタがロナに向けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta raised a shard of glass toward Rona.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガラスの破片を振り上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She lifted the glass shard high.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロナからドンタッチミー！」
「ぎゃー！　やめろ、ビスケッタさん！」
（ああ……わたし、やっと死ねるんだ……）
「ぎゃぁぁぁぁぁぁあああー！
ロォォォォォナァァァァァァ！？」
「ぎゃーーーーーーーーーーー！」
レッドアイが体をブルブルと震わせる。
寄生する力すら失ったのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It had even lost the power to parasitize,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自らトッポスから離れ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it deliberately detached itself from Toppos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイの本体が床に落ちる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The main body of Red Eye fell to the floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまで全てを踏み潰してきた筈の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Red Eye, who until now had crushed everything,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レッドアイが惨めに床を這いつくばっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was now miserably crawling on the floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故、このミーがァァァ……

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't the greatest cause of defeat learning to protect others?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学習したことではないでしょうか」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:
